name: Mojo 2: Mia
description:
"Mojo2: Mia” is a new version of the famous game “2048”, an original approach to this well-known puzzle. Beautiful Mia will keep you company during the game. The more points you get, the less clothes remain on the girl.
Will you be able to make her strip completely?

This simple yet captivating game will help you train your brain (+100 IQ).
